mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.match_id AS "matchId", a.user_id AS "userId", a.process_id AS "processId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.routine_pass AS "routinePass"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ps_match_user( match_id, user_id, process_id, routine_pass ) VALUES ( #{matchId}, #{userId}, #{processId}, #{routinePass} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ps_match_user SET match_id = #{matchId}, user_id = #{userId}, process_id = #{processId}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, routine_pass = #{routinePass} WHERE id = #{id}
